alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 6:49PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Callahan, southern Jones, southwestern Shackelford and northern Taylor Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 649 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Merkel, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Wylie, Merkel, Tye, Buffalo Gap, Trent, Eula, Potosi, View, Hamby, Caps, Dyess Afb, Impact, Camp Butman, Kirby Lake and Stith. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 261 and 304. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
